MemberSignature.Value: public int DAdvise (IntPtr a, uint b, IntPtr c, ref uint d);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 DAdvise(native int a, unsigned int32 b, native int c, unsigned int32& d) cil managed
Public Function DAdvise (a As IntPtr, b As UInteger, c As IntPtr, ByRef d As UInteger) As Integer
public: virtual int DAdvise(IntPtr a, System::UInt32 b, IntPtr c, System::UInt32 % d);
abstract member DAdvise : nativeint * uint32 * nativeint * uint32 -> int override this.DAdvise : nativeint * uint32 * nativeint * uint32 -> int

param.name: a
param.span: 指向 的指针，它定义通知的格式、介质和目标设备。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format, medium, and target device for notifications.

param.name: b
param.span: 值，它指定所请求的连接行为。

span.span: An value specifying the requested behavior for the connection.

param.name: c
param.span: 指向调用方对象上的 的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the on the caller object.

param.name: d
param.span: 指向连接的指针，该连接由对 DAdvise 方法的此调用设置。

span.span: A pointer to the connection set up by this call to the DAdvise method.

summary.span: 创建 对象与调用方对象之间的通知连接，使调用方接收到有关数据对象中数据更改的通知。

span.span: Creates a notification connection between a object and a caller object, letting the caller receive notification of changes in the data for the data object.

Docs.returns:
DAdvise 方法支持 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY 等标准返回值以及下面的返回值：The DAdvise method supports the standard returns values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | DAdvise 方法成功创建了连接。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | The DAdvise method successfully created the connection. | | E\_NOTIMPL | 数据对象不实现 DAdvise 方法。| | E\_NOTIMPL | The data object does not implement the DAdvise method. | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | 索引无效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | 数据指针值无效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | The data pointer value is not valid. | | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | 对象不支持更改通知。| | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | The object does not support change notification. |

span.span: The connection to destroy.

summary.span: 损坏由于先前调用 方法而创建的通知连接。

span.span: Destroys a notification connection that was created by an earlier call to the method.

Docs.returns: | 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | DUnadvise 方法成功删除了指定连接。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | The DUnadvise method successfully deleted the specified connection. | | OLE\_E\_NOCONNECTION | 指定连接不是有效连接。| | OLE\_E\_NOCONNECTION | The specified connection is not a valid connection. | | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | 对象不支持更改通知。| | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | The object does not support change notification. |

param.span: 如果对 EnumDAdvise 方法的调用将 设置为 ，则说明没有连接。

span.span: There are no connections if this call to the EnumDAdvise method sets to .

summary.span: 检索指向一个对象的指针，该对象可以枚举此 对象当前维护的通知连接。

span.span: Retrieves a pointer to an object that can enumerate the notification connections that are currently maintained by this object.

Docs.returns:
EnumDAdvise 方法支持标准返回值 E_OUTOFMEMORY 和以下返回值：The EnumDAdvise method supports the standard return value E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 对 EnumDAdvise 方法的此次调用成功创建了枚举器对象的实例。或者没有连接。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | This call to the EnumDAdvise method successfully created the instance of the enumerator object.-or-There are no connections. | | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | 对象不支持更改通知。| | OLE\_E\_ADVISENOTSUPPORTED | The object does not support change notification. |

param.name: a
param.span: 指向 的指针，它为检索数据的调用定义格式、介质和目标设备。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format, medium, and target device for calls to retrieve data.

param.name: b
param.span: 一个指向 的输出指针，它包含特定呈现可能具有的最常见信息；如果 方法返回 DATA_S_SAMEFORMATETC，则为 。

span.span: An output pointer to a containing the most general information possible for a specific rendering, or , if the method returns DATA_S_SAMEFORMATETC.

summary.span: 检索指向标准 结构的指针，该结构在逻辑上等效于（但不一定等于） 参数引用的 结构。

span.span: Retrieves a pointer to a standard structure that is logically equivalent to, but not necessarily equal to, the structure that is referenced by the parameter.

Docs.returns:
GetCanonicalFormatEtc 方法支持 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY 等标准返回值以及下面的返回值：The GetCanonicalFormatEtc method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | |S\_OK |返回的 FORMATETC 与参数中传递的结构不同。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | The returned FORMATETC is different from the structure passed in the parameters. | | DATA\_S\_SAMEFORMATETC | 返回的 FORMATETC 与参数中传递的结构相同，并且 在 中返回。| | DATA\_S\_SAMEFORMATETC | The returned FORMATETC is the same as the structure passed in the parameters and is returned in . | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | 索引无效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | 无效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | is not valid. | | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | 对象应用程序未运行。| | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | The object application is not running. |

param.name: pFormat

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format, medium, and target device for calls to retrieve data.

param.span: 指向 的指针，它指示包含返回数据的存储介质。

span.span: A pointer to the indicating the storage medium containing the returned data.

summary.span: 呈现指定的 pFormat 结构中描述的数据，并将它传输给 参数。

span.span: Renders the data that is described in the specified pFormat structure and transfers it to the parameter.

Docs.returns:
GetData 方法支持 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY 等标准返回值以及下面的返回值：The GetData method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 对 GetData 方法的此调用成功地检索到了数据，并将数据放入了所提供的存储介质中。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | This call to the GetData method successfully retrieved and placed data in the provided storage medium. | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | 索引无效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | 无效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | is not valid. | | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed 无效。| | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed is not valid. | | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect 无效。| | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect is not valid. | | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | 对象应用程序未运行。| | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | The object application is not running. | | STG\_E\_MEDIUMFULL | 分配介质时出错。| | STG\_E\_MEDIUMFULL | An error occurred when allocating the medium. |

param.name: a
param.span: 指向 的指针，它为检索数据的调用定义格式、介质和目标设备。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format, medium, and target device for calls to retrieve data.

summary.span: 确定数据对象是否能够呈现 结构中所描述的数据。

span.span: Determines whether the data object is capable of rendering the data described in the structure.

summary.span: 尝试执行粘贴或删除操作的对象可以在调用 来获取操作是否成功的指示之前调用此方法。

span.span: Objects attempting a paste or drop operation can call this method before calling to get an indication of whether the operation may be successful.

Docs.returns:
QueryGetData 方法支持 E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY 等标准返回值以及下面的返回值：The QueryGetData method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 对 方法的后续调用可能会成功。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | A subsequent call to the method probably will be successful. | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | 索引无效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | 无效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | is not valid. | | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed 无效。| | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed is not valid. | | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect 值。| | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect value. | | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | 对象应用程序未运行。| | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | The object application is not running. |

MemberSignature.Value: public int SetData (IntPtr a, IntPtr b, int c);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 SetData(native int a, native int b, int32 c) cil managed
Public Function SetData (a As IntPtr, b As IntPtr, c As Integer) As Integer
public: virtual int SetData(IntPtr a, IntPtr b, int c);
abstract member SetData : nativeint * nativeint * int -> int override this.SetData : nativeint * nativeint * int -> int

param.name: a
param.span: 一个指向 的指针，它为 对象定义在解释存储介质中存储的数据时应采用的格式。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the format for the object to use when interpreting the data contained in the storage medium.

param.name: b
param.span: 指向 的指针，它为 SetData 方法定义用来传递数据的存储介质。

span.span: A pointer to the defining the storage medium for the SetData method to use to pass the data.

param.name: c
param.span: 如果要指定被调用的 对象在调用后拥有存储介质，并且必须在使用完介质后释放介质，则为 ；如果要指定调用方保留对存储介质的所有权，且数据对象只在调用期间使用介质，则为 。

span.span: to specify that the called object owns the storage medium after the call and must free the medium after it has been used; otherwise, to specify the caller retains ownership of the storage medium and the data object uses the medium for the duration of the call only.

summary.span: 将包含在 结构中、被 引用的数据传输到 对象的此实例。

span.span: Transfers the data that is contained in the structure, referenced by , to this instance of the object.

Docs.returns:
SetData 方法支持 E_FAIL、E_INVALIDARG、E_UNEXPECTED 和 E_OUTOFMEMORY 等标准返回值以及下面的返回值：The SetData method supports the standard return values E_FAIL, E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following return values:
| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | 对 SetData 方法的调用成功传输了数据。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | This call to the SetData method successfully transferred the data. | | E\_NOTIMPL | 没有为 对象实现 SetData 方法。| | E\_NOTIMPL | The SetData method is not implemented for the object. | | DV\_E\_LINDEX | 索引无效。| | DV\_E\_LINDEX | lindex is not valid. | | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | pFormatEtc 无效。| | DV\_E\_FORMATETC | pFormatEtc is not valid. | | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed 无效。| | DV\_E\_TYMED | tymed is not valid. | | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect 无效。| | DV\_E\_DVASPECT | dwAspect is not valid. | | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | 对象应用程序未运行。| | OLE\_E\_NOTRUNNING | The object application is not running. |
